channel.title: New Glitch/Hack? Double Click Login to Hack the Account, and destroy it?
channel.description: I have a HUGE problem on my server. If someone double clicks the login button, even if they have the wrong password, it logs them into the account, and deletes it. This started happening out of nowhere, the only code iv added recently was Java's explode button (pwns btw :P). Anybody see or know of anyway to fix this?

@slomifier wrote:

come on please, this is important!

Read full topic
